data.title: Wonderful homemade hot chocolate & whip cream
data.text: Very friendly staff  and atmosphere.  Mostly a coffee shop but their hot chocolate is homemade and so is their whip cream.  Been a while that I was able to enjoy such a good cup.  They also have tea, chai, Italian sodas, coffee (of course) and a few other drinks to enjoy.  They also serve some food items.  It is also a nice quick walk to 25th street and the outside theater.

data.title: Welcoming, warm atmosphere, Great Coffee
data.text: This is a lovely place to spend time chatting with friends, meeting with clients or just relaxing on the comfortable furniture in a lovely environment.  The coffee is delicious.  I also had a Chai Latte which was excellent.  A few good snacks and pastries fill out the menu and make this a great place to spend time!
